short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you save articles to DMER Medical e-Library

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The DMER Medical e-Library Extension is a white-labeled version of MyLOFT, designed exclusively for the Department of Medical Education and Research (DMER), Maharashtra. 

This extension allows you to save, organize, and access academic resources seamlessly while browsing, complementing the DMER Medical e-Library mobile app and digital platform.

üåü Key Features:

Access Subscribed Resources: Quickly reach e-content and journals subscribed to by DMER Medical e-Library.

Save and Sync: Easily save articles and organize them within your DMER Medical e-Library account, accessible across all your devices.

Content Organization: Use tags and collections to group and manage your articles effectively.
This visionary initiative by the Government of Maharashtra empowers the medical community with cutting-edge learning resources. 

üìñ Start saving, organizing, and excelling today with the DMER Medical e-Library Extension!
